comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:6.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/6.0.1
Build ID: 20110830092941

Steps to reproduce:

Save a additional (second) mail message (while composing) as html-file after saving a previous mail message (while composing) as html-file.
( File > Save as > File... )


Actual results:

The subject text of that mail message (becoming the file name) is the same as previous saved mail message and NOT the subject of the present one.

The same thing happens while saving a second plain-text mail message (.txt) after having saved a previous plain-text one.



Expected results:

It should be de subject (becomming the file name) of the present one.
